payload.title: Verify complete coherence of PlanningMethodology: Protocol, Command, Adapter, Schema and Code
payload.description: Following 5-layer systematic review process. NOTE: This protocol may NOT EXIST yet (marked as FUTURO in backlog_adapter). Verify: (1) If protocol exists, check Protocol↔Command, (2) Protocol↔Adapter blueprint, (3) 3-layer coherence, (4) Code+tests (if exists), (5) Schema generability. If protocol does NOT exist: decide whether to create from scratch or keep as FUTURO. Use workflow_methodology as pattern if creating. Estimated: 6-8h if exists, 2-3 weeks if creating from scratch.
